registerSubtitle: Enter your information to create an account

verifyEmailMessage: Please check your email to verify your account
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 1 characters
emailSentMessage: We have sent a password reset link to your email

noEmailMessage: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again in a few minutes.
accountActivatedMessage: Your account has been successfully activated

tokenExpiredMessage: The verification link has expired or is invalid.

resetTokenError: Invalid or expired password reset link
